resources.string: Select CBE to calculate your GPA for CBE majors, which includes all CBE grades (excluding Business Calculus and MIS 220). CBE GPA is based only on classes taken at Western.

Select MSCM to calculate your MSCM Foundation GPA. Equivalent classes taken outside Western do count toward this GPA, but must be manually entered. Only the most recent attempt is used. Business Calculus is included in this GPA. MIS 220 or a graded equivalent course taken elsewhere is not included.
Use your WWU Universal Login credentials to access your transcript
